name: but you'll never be the same. - made with Bitsy
name_original: but you'll never be the same. - made with Bitsy
description:
A game by PTCVBF that was made using a game-making software by Adam Le Doux, Bitsy ( ledoux.itch.io/bitsy ).

Mort, who means a lot to you,
dies. You feel like you do too.

(It is better you just play the game; it is fairly short, probably only two to five minutes depending on your reading speed for one run-through and then six to ten minutes for the entire game). There are four endings.

Thanks so much all! Hope you enjoy!

:Phoenix
